attributes.action: GCSE student to get predicted grades
attributes.additional_details: I want them to do this because I think it’s unfair on the gcse students who may have to sit there exams later on in the year. There education has been ruined and they won’t get the same fair chance as everyone else.
attributes.background: I would like them to give predictive grades for GCSE student who are sitting exams this year.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Education Secretary has said that this year the Government will "put our trust in teachers rather than algorithms": https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2021-01-06/debates/D2A64DD9-6A6B-4EAB-8001-C3BACDE25B02/Covid-19EducationalSettings

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel GCSE and A-levels in 2021 replace with Course Work and Teacher Assessment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/
